pageProduct.name: Avene Physiolift Smoothing Day Cream 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Smoothing anti-ageing day cream for dry sensitive skin.

Warnings

Formulated to minimize the risks of allergy. Non comedogenic. For external use only. Avoid contact with the eyes.  Can be used when pregnant.

Common Uses

Smoothing day cream which smoothes pronounced wrinkles, visibly replumps the skin and fill deep furrows, moistuirzes, protect and brighten the skin in lack of luminostiy, and helps restructure the skin suffering from a loss of firmness.

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE. DIMETHICONE. BUTYLENE GLYCOL. GLYCERIN. CETEARYL ALCOHOL. BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER (BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII BUTTER). GLYCERYL STEARATE. PEG-100 STEARATE. BEHENYL ALCOHOL. BIS-PEG-12 DIMETHICONE BEESWAX. 1,2-HEXANEDIOL. AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/VP COPOLYMER. ASCOPHYLLUM NODOSUM EXTRACT. CAPRYLYL GLYCOL. CETEARYL GLUCOSIDE. DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER. DISODIUM EDTA. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). MICA. PVP. SILICA. SODIUM HYALURONATE. SODIUM HYDROXIDE. TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891). TOCOPHEROL. TOCOPHERYL ACETATE. TOCOPHERYL GLUCOSIDE. WATER (AQUA). XANTHAN GUM.

Directions

Apply in the morning onto face, neck and neckline after cleansing, a fine mist of Avène Thermal Spring Water and Physiolift serum all over the face.
